document.full_text: in 10 seasons at ohio state, jim tressel, with the help of the news media, has cultivated an image as college football's mr. rogers. in reality, tressel is simply another win-at-all-cost boss.
document.title: sports of the times: the best punishment for tressel? let him stay
lines_and_colors: in 10 seasons at ohio state, jim tressel, with the help of the news media, has cultivated an image as college football's mr. rogers. in reality, tressel is simply another win-at-all-cost boss.
